name: Anand Sivasubramaniam
content: anand.html Anand Sivasubramaniam ACM Fellow; IEEE Fellow; Fellow of the National Academy of Inventors (NAI); Charles Godfrey Binder Professor of Engineering Office: W320 Westgate Building The Pennsylvania State University University Park, PA 16802 E-mail: anand@cse.psu.edu Tel: (814)865-1406 Fax: (814)865-3176 Bio: B.Tech in Computer Science, Indian Institute of Technology, Madras, (1989). MS in Computer Science, College of Computing, Georgia Institute of Technology, (1991). Ph.D in Computer Science, College of Computing, Georgia Institute of Technology, (1995). Assistant Professor, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (08/1995-06/2000). Associate Professor, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (07/2000-06/2004). Professor, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (07/2004-12/2016). Distinguished Professor, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (01/2017-06/2025). Charles Godfrey Binder Professor of Engineering, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (07/2025- ). Associate Head, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (07/2023-). Fellow of the National Academy of Inventors (NAI), 2024 Fellow of the ACM, 2017 Fellow of the IEEE, 2012 I am the Program Chair for HPCA 2025 . Please consider submitting your best work for this premier conference in Computer Architecture. Research Honors/Awards Personal Trivia
